fields.name: Austin Hope Cabernet Sauvignon Paso Robles
fields.description: Paso Robles, California- The classic ruby color of this wine is stunning and sets the stage for this robust Cabernet Sauvignon. On the nose, aromas of tobacco, dark chocolate shavings, fresh black currant hints of savory notes.

fields.name: Au Pied du Mont Chauve Saint Aubin Charmois Rouge
fields.description: Wine Enthusiast -Saint-Aubin, Burgundy, France - "This smoky, generously structured wine comes from the Picard family's Saint-Aubin vineyard closest to Chassagne-Montrachet. It has swathes of ripe fruits balanced by acidity. Rich and powerful..."

fields.name: Verdon Estate Proprietary Red Blueline Vineyards Napa Valley
fields.description: The Tasting Panel-Napa, CA-"A superb red, with aromas of briar-laden boysenberry, chocolate, and coffee bean. Rich on the palate, with melting dark chocolate, giving it a grainy mouthfeel. Sumptuous, almost chewy and meaty, with notes of iron and white pepper that wakes up the back of the palate..."

fields.name: Halos de Jupiter Cotes du Rhone
fields.description: Jeb Dunnuck-Rhone, France- "The 2019 Cotes du Rhone is a fruit-forward pleasure bomb of a wine that has loads of ripe red and blue fruits, some classic Southern Rhone peppery herbs and violet notes, medium to full body, and a plush, rounded mouthfeel that's already a joy to drink."

fields.name: Cais da Ribeira Douro Red Reserva Port Barrel Aged
fields.description: Wine Enthusiast -Douro, Portugal - "Partially aged in Port barrels, this wine has gained an extra warmth and richness. The tannins and generous black fruits are impressive, concentrated and very flavorful."

fields.name: Layer Cake Pinot Noir
fields.description: California- Fermented gently at cool temperatures to preserve aromatics, the wine was gently pressed and aged in French oak; partly new, but also much of it in our once-used Cherry Pie barrels. The result is a rich, delicious wine that screams Pinot Noir.

fields.name: The Fugitive Red Dry Creek Valley
fields.description: Dry Creek Valley, Sonoma, CA- Aromas of blackberry and blueberry jam, graham cracker crust and hints of espresso and spice are followed by rich, layered flavors of black cherry and mocha.

fields.name: Chateau Vrai Canon Bouche Canon-Fronsac
fields.description: Int'l Wine Cellar-Bordeaux, France- "Blending 55% Merlot and 45%... The wine is aging in 50% new, French oak. With floral and dark cherry scents, the wine is round, soft and delivers a plush blast of plum and chocolate on the palate."

fields.name: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet Red Wine
fields.description: California-"Layered and complex... leaps from the glass with aromas of blackberry cobbler, graham cracker, brown sugar, milk chocolate, coffee and smoke. Palate of blueberry pie, praline, sweet vanilla custard, caramel and mocha is framed by soft chewy tannins and a hint of toasted oak"

fields.name: Moone Tsai Cabernet Napa
fields.description: Vinous-Napa, CA - "The 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley is dark, plush and super-expressive. Black cherry, blackberry jam, chocolate, spice and new oak infuse this exotic, inky Cabernet with notable richness and complexity."

fields.name: Silver Ghost Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
fields.description: James Suckling-Napa Valley, California- "Aromas and flavors of dried flowers with currants, blackberries and violets. It's full-bodied with soft, refined tannins and a savory finish. Pretty length, too"

fields.name: Thievery Cabernet Sauvignon
fields.description: California- The perfect crowd pleaser, full of aromas of vanilla, fresh toast, and toasted oak followed by flavors of blueberry, and blackberry that pull you in. Pairs well with pasta, grilled meats and veggies.

fields.name: Torial Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
fields.description: Napa, CA- The deep concentrated color is matched by the intense raspberry and blackberry notes that complement this full bodied, smooth textured wine. Crafted by Joe Wagner well known for creating Belle Glos Pinot Noirs. Torial is Joe's first Cabernet to be released. Vegan

fields.name: Harvester Cabernet Sauvignon Paso Robles
fields.description: Beverage Dynamics-Paso Robles, Central Coast, CA- "Full-bodied with inviting flavors of red berries, spice, and velvety tannins; a densely-packed Cabernet that is defined by its soft, luscious finish." Crafted by Austin Hope of Hope Family Wines.

fields.name: Mascota Vineyards La Mascota Malbec
fields.description: James Suckling-Mendoza, Argentina - "A very pretty malbec with blackberry and violet aromas and flavors. Medium body. Creamy, polished tannins and a long, flavorful finish. Drink now." Expressive Malbec that would be a great pair for red meat and hard cheeses.

fields.name: Neethlingshof The Owl Post Pinotage
fields.description: Stellenbosch, South Africa- Ripe berry and banana aromas with vanilla oak perfumes give way to a rich and velvety palate of black cherry, plum and vanilla flavors. This single-vineyard Pinotage is excellent served with grilled meat, game, or hearty stews.

fields.name: Macchia Zinfandel Mischievous Lodi
fields.description: Lodi, CA- This old vine Zinfandel is a blend of five different old vine vineyards, resulting in a classic fruit-forward wine that is the centerpiece of all great Lodi wines. The rich, ripe berry flavors are highlighted with a subtle hint of soft vanilla-oak. Pair with veal or red meat.

fields.name: Borderline Red Blend Sonoma
fields.description: Sonoma County, CA- Notes of elderflower and baking spice lead to rich flavors of dark cherry, black currant, and toasted mesquite. Dark fruit is balanced by an underlying acidity that is matched by structured tannins, creating a smooth finish. Full-bodied wine pairs with lamb or pork.

fields.name: River Road Pinot Noir Russian River Valley Reserve
fields.description: Russian River Valley, Sonoma, CA- This Pinot Noir reflects the benefits of a cooler climate by exhibiting loads of elegance, with sweet cherry and plum flavors. Perfectly balanced refined fruit and soft tannins create a seductive, silky smooth wine.

fields.name: River Road Pinot Noir
fields.description: California- This Pinot Noir made by winemaker Ed Morris has a wonderful balance of finesse and bright, harmonious notes of cherry, wild berry, plum, and spice. Shows depth and complexity in the long finish. The perfect red wine with salmon.

fields.name: Belcreme de Lys Pinot Noir
fields.description: Previously this wine was labeled as Creme de Lys.

fields.name: River Road Chardonnay Russian River Valley Reserve
fields.description: Russian River, Sonoma, CA- Winemaker Ed Morris has put together another seamless gem with this affordable boutique wine. Vibrant, with a hint of vanilla and bright fresh pear flavors in a full-bodied format, with a long clean finish. Perfect with broiled pork chops.

fields.name: Courtney Benham Pinot Noir Napa
fields.description: James Suckling-Carneros, Napa, CA- "A very typical pinot with sweet-strawberry, light walnut, lemon and orange-peel character. It's medium-bodied with fine tannins and a beautiful finish with finesse and pretty fruit..."

fields.name: Renieri Invetro
fields.description: James Suckling-Tuscsny, Italy - "Very pretty cherry and burnt-orange character on the nose and palate. It's full-bodied with hints of smoke and toasted oak. Rich, like the vintage, but shows form."

fields.name: Mantellassi Le Sentinelle Morellino di Scansano Riserva
fields.description: Medium to full bodied wine. Good balance of acidity and tannins. Black fruit and plum notes on the palate. Smooth drink.

fields.name: Leone D'Oro Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
fields.description: James Suckling-Tuscany, Italy - "A Vino Nobile with really good fruit and spice on the nose, such as brambleberries, blueberry tart, citrus, five-spice powder and strawberry compote. The palate is rich but very structured and lithe with beautiful, blue-fruit flavor that rolls over firm tannins."

fields.name: Villa Maffei Valpolicella
fields.description: Valpolicella Classico, Veneto, Italy- A deep ruby red color with great fruit aromas on the nose. The taste is velvety, warm and refined, with light oak. An excellent choice to serve with roasted meats and pasta dishes.

fields.name: Tenuta di Renieri Chianti Classico
fields.description: James Suckling-Toscana, Tuscany, Italy - "A fresh nose of redcurrants, cherries, floral and orange zest. It's medium-bodied with creamy tannins. Fine and pretty with lively acidity. Delicious."

fields.name: Zaccagnini Montepulciano D'Abruzzo
fields.description: Abruzzo, Italy - Intense violet robe. Aromas of plum and ripe blackberry. Each sip delivers a mouthful of ripe berries, leather and black pepper with subtle hints of oregano, dried herbs and a touch of vanilla; all leading to a dry and supple finish.

fields.name: Barba I Vasari Old Vines Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
fields.description: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo, Italy - Energetic and intense, but approachable, this ripe fully bodied red is absolutely delicious. Notes of rich berries and plum jump out on the palate. Juicy and rich, yet finishes long and smooth. This is great on its own, but pairs beautifully with pasta.

fields.name: Armani Pinot Grigio Venezie
fields.description: Venezie, Veneto, Italy- Crisp apple and pear flavors are highlighted by a light creaminess in this dry yet flavorful wine from the Armani family. The grapes used in this wine come from some of the Armanis' best vineyards. Serve with roasted chicken, seafood or other lighter fare.

fields.name: Albino Armani Pinot Grigio Corvara
fields.description: Valdadige, Italy - Valdadige, Italy - Summer in a bottle. White flower, apple, pear flavors. A must-have when there's seafood on the table. A single vineyard of unparalleled purity. Perfectly balanced with a long and complex finish.

fields.name: Bishop's Ring Cabernet Napa
fields.description: Napa Valley, CA- Concentrated, with plush tannins wrapped around a raspberry, baking spices, cedar and mineral flavors. This has excellent structure, depth and focus, and it's so smooth and open now.

fields.name: Orin Swift Slander Pinot Noir
fields.description: California- Bursting aromas of strawberry, cherries and savory tones of lavender and thyme. This wine has subtle soft tannins, showing the sophisticated integration of balanced oak that finishes with a creamy mouthfeel.

fields.name: Clos Labarde St. Emilion Grand Cru
fields.description: Wine Enthusiast -Saint-Emillion, Bordeaux, France- "Approaching maturity, this is a rich, balanced wine. Secondary flavors come through the black fruitiness, while tannins support the wine's richness. From an 11-acre vineyard to the east of Saint-Emilion city..."

fields.name: Quinta das Carvalhas Tinto Douro
fields.description: Wine Spectator-Douro, Portugal - "Stylish, with silky-textured flavors of plum and boysenberry preserves that glide through, flecked with anise and fruitcake notes that meld into the fruit through the finish."

fields.name: Latitud 42 Rioja Crianza
fields.description: Beverage Dynamics-Rioja, Spain - "A superb wine that is firm and bold in texture and flavor, while keeping the elegance of a classic Rioja. Soft raspberry and rich blackberry blend like a fine Bordeaux, and are bound together by a nice use of oak for structure."

fields.name: Mascota Vineyards Unanime Merlot
fields.description: James Suckling-Mendoza, Argentina- "Aromas of ripe plum, blueberry, kumquat and cocoa butter. It's medium to full bodied with firm, ripe tannins. Polished and creamy with a velvety, caressing finish. Tight and chewy. Nicely done for merlot..."

fields.name: San Gregorio Las 75 Vendimias
fields.description: James Suckling-Aragon, Spain - "A ripe and pretty red with ripe berry, spice and walnut undertones. Full-bodied and fruity with some chewy tannins and a flavorful finish." Pairs beautifully with food.

fields.name: Luquet Macon Villages Les Mulots
fields.description: Macon-Villages, Burgundy, France- A refreshing unoaked Chardonnay from southern Burgundy filled with ripe apple and floral notes. Bright and crisp, it will make an ideal wine to sip as an apertif, or pair it with fresh shellfish or light seafood dishes. Unoaked.

fields.name: Iter Chardonnay California
fields.description: Beverage Dynamics-California - "This very tropical chardonnay is ripe and energetic on the palate and the finish is lengthy. Fresh and fun, the smooth creamy texture works to give the wine a beautiful balance."

fields.name: The Calling Chardonnay Sonoma Coast
fields.description: Wine Enthusiast -Sonoma Coast, Sonoma County, California - "Bright and racy with a textured core of Meyer lemon and crushed rock, this wine impresses in its balance of richness and acidity. Secondary notes of brioche and oak come to the fore as it develops, finishing weighty and with length."

fields.name: Scilio Valle Galfina Etna Bianco DOC
fields.description: Wine Enthusiast -Etna, Sicily, Italy - "Initially shy, the delicate nose eventually reveals scents of Spanish broom, yellow apple and hazelnut. Made with organically grown Carricante, the dry, racy palate offers lemon zest, pear and a hint of white almond before a saline close."
